data.message: Used to be a fan, till you not only rambled your rant about Trump (a rather establishment move on your part, which went against everything you stood for,) but it was also a TERRIBLE freestyle performance. You're losing it, and that's a fact. Slowing down isn't your fault, but you gotta know where to call it quits with the music career and pick up as an activist or something, if you actually give a damn.

replies.message: How in the hell did Eminem dissing the president of America go against everything he believes in? He's always dissed the president and do you really think eminem give a sing shit if your not a fan anymore, he has millions of fans that will always be fans as we appreciate the art
Jonathan how fucking dumb are you?
On a dumbshit scale of 1-10 he's an easy 11, good job bro you exceed the amount of stupid that is tolerable in society.
Listen to his previous albums he has dissed every president.
Trump is the establishment, lol. He went against that.

He has put out shitty albums for longer than he has his good ones now. If this album isnt a reversal or otherwise a "revival" I will just continue to listen to the albums from sslp to encore and just forget about all the albums past encore. I'm a fan but it doesn't mean i have to suck his dick, worship every song, and think everything is good.
Shut up, if you’re not a fan anymore, just unfollow him and leave

he literally used to bash president bush in multiple songs and nobody batted an eye
Now he's dissing trump and you all lose your shit, just goes to show how many mindless sheep there are in America
The stupid is real with you ingrates. And no, Bryce Newcombe I'm not your bro, and thank god because I'd probably neck myself being related to a belligerent buffoon like you.

Steve Eilers smaller than you'll ever be, brick-wall-for-brains. Ironic how the gorilla flexing in front of a camera for a profile pic because you're that insecure of your body is going out calling people dumb 😂. You guys are too easy.

It's called a cypher
